description: A total of 39 international students are due to return to King William's College next week.
title: Isle of Man's international students allowed to return
title_page: Isle of Man's international students allowed to return - BBC News
maintext: The Isle of Man border is closed to non-residents but the pupils, who will be travelling from across Europe, China and Hong Kong, through the UK, have been given permission by the Manx government to return.
